challenge.title: Heather Pierce - Intro Statistics with Geogebra
challenge.description: Heather Pierce's Intro Statistics (with Geogebra) playlist on YouTube (30+ videos) is an introduction to statistics using the free website Geogebra.
challenge.instructions: Watch Dr. Pierce's Intro Statistics (with Geogebra) playlist on YouTube.
